name: Core_Scanner_getWordTextBytes
success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned a pointer to the Bytes of the current word.
description: Get a pointer to the Bytes of the current word.@{newline()}
The pointer remains valid as long as the @{code('Core_Scanner')} or derived type object is valid and the state of the scanner does not change.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
